Verify documents to keep the knowledge up to date within customer corpus.

If not present or not supported, defaults to the closest match or `en`.","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["documentId"],"properties":{"documentId":{"type":"string","description":"The document which is verified."},"action":{"type":"string","enum":["VERIFY","DEPRECATE","UNVERIFY"],"description":"The verification action requested."}},"title":"VerifyRequest"}}},"description":"Details about the verification request.","required":true,"x-exportParamName":"VerifyRequest"}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
